mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, U.ORG_ID, USER_NM, U.EMAIL, HP_NO, ORG_NM FROM BMS_USER_MST U, BMS_ORG_MST O WHERE USER_ID = #{RCPT_IDS} AND U.ORG_ID = O.ORG_ID

SELECT U.USER_ID, U.USER_NM, U.ORG_ID, O.ORG_NM FROM BMS_USER_MST U, BMS_ORG_MST O WHERE U.ORG_ID = O.ORG_ID AND U.USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT U.USER_ID FROM BMS_USER_MST U, BMS_ORG_MST O WHERE U.ORG_ID = O.ORG_ID AND U.USER_ID = #{RCPT_IDS})
AND U.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND U.USER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY U.USER_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BMS_EMAIL_MST(EMAIL_ID, SENDER_NM, SENDER_ADDR, RCPT_IDS, EMAIL_TITLE, EMAIL_CONTENTS, SEND_DIV, SEND_STS, REG_DTM, RSV_DTM, SEND_DTM, UPD_DTM, UPD_ID) VALUES (#{EMAIL_ID}, #{SENDER_NM}, #{SENDER_ADDR}, #{RCPT_IDS}, #{EMAIL_TITLE}, #{EMAIL_CONTENTS}, #{SEND_DIV}, #{SEND_STS}, #{REG_DTM}, #{RSV_DTM}, #{SEND_DTM}, #{UPD_DTM}, #{UPD_ID})
mapper.update: UPDATE BMS_EMAIL_MST SET EMAIL_ID = #{EMAIL_ID}, SENDER_NM = #{SENDER_NM}, SENDER_ADDR = #{SENDER_ADDR}, RCPT_IDS = #{RCPT_IDS}, EMAIL_TITLE = #{EMAIL_TITLE}, EMAIL_CONTENTS = #{EMAIL_CONTENTS}, SEND_DIV = #{SEND_DIV}, SEND_STS = #{SEND_STS}, REG_DTM = #{REG_DTM}, RSV_DTM = #{RSV_DTM}, SEND_DTM = #{SEND_DTM}, UPD_DTM = #{UPD_DTM}, UPD_ID = #{UPD_ID}
